<style>
.t4s-hero-image-item .t4s-content-position {
  height: 100%;
  max-width: unset;
}

.t4s-hero-image-item .t4s-bl-item {
  position: absolute;
  font-size: 1.8rem;

color: transparent;
}

.t4s-hero-image-item .t4s-bl-item:first-of-type {
    width: 11%;

    bottom: 12%;
    right: 78.7%;
}

 width: 18%;
    height: 12%;
    bottom: 12%;
    right: 58.8%;

}

  width: 8%;

  top: 22%;
  right: 28%;
}

/* Responsive adjustments for screens smaller than 768px */

        width: 46.4%;
        height: 7.6%;
        bottom: 16.8%;
        left: 26.8%;
  }

  .t4s-hero-image-item .t4s-bl-item:nth-of-type(2) {
           height: 7.2%;
        bottom: 7.8%;
        left: 25.7%;
        width: 46%;
  }
.t4s-hero-image-item .t4s-bl-item:nth-of-type(3) {
    height: 4%;
    top: 57%;
    left: 35%;
    width: 22%;
  }
}

.t4s-custom-section,.t4s-testimonials, .t4s-custom-liquid {
  margin-top: -1px;
}
</style>

Gift Card Offer!

×
Earn a $50 Promotional Gift Card when you spend $250, a $100 Promotional Gift Card when you spend $450, and a $300 Promotional Gift Card when you spend $850. Offer valid on all items in store. Offer valid online only November 07-December 02, 2024. Online purchases must be made by 11:59 pm PCT on the stated offer end dates to earn Promotional Gift Cards. Promotional Gift Cards will be sent via email within three days after placing the order. Promotional Gift Cards are valid for use on future purchases online only November 07, 2024 – December 31, 2024. Qualifying spend threshold excludes sales tax. May not be used in conjunction with any other certificate offer. Not valid on prior purchases or bill payments, or toward the purchase of gift cards, or purchase-with-purchase items. Transfer is permitted; however, each code is limited to one use per person. Once redeemed by another, further requests will not be accommodated. Return policy: if you return an item for which you received a Promotional Gift Card, your Promotional Gift Card value(s) and/or return value may be reduced in an amount equal to the value of the Promotional Gift Card earned on the returned item. Exclusions apply.

Shop Now

.t4s-top-heading {/* margin-bottom: var(--tophead-mb); */ display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 1em;}
.t4s-top-heading {/* margin-bottom: var(--tophead-mb); */ display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 1em;}

settings.text: Transform your space into an artistic sanctuary with our Spiral Snake Design Rug in vibrant hues. Featuring a mesmerizing spiral snake pattern, this rug is a fusion of art and fashion, sure to captivate the eye of any discerning connoisseur.

Dive into a whimsical underwater world with our coral-style rug. This captivating rug brings the beauty of coral to your space in bold fluorescent hues, adding a touch of cosmic charm and playful delight. Perfect for those who love to infuse their decor with fun, imagination, and a hint of the unknown.

A cute, pastel rug boasting a yellow and purple checkered rug, accented by a charming pink wavy border. It offers the practicality of making this multi color rug both visually appealing and functional. This rug is a perfect addition to any space with its playful design and practical features.

custom_css: .t4s-col-item > div {position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; z-index: 9999; transform: translate(-50%, -50%);}

settings.text: We are Lany space, a rug brand dedicated to making modern city life easier, more comfortable, and more stylish with a youthful spirit. Every rug, every design, every space invites you to embrace color, style, and individuality without reservation.

settings.heading: Perfect Rug for Dog Owners!
settings.content: I had been searching for the perfect rug. Once I saw this one it was love at first sight, the perfect rug for me would be unconventional and pet-friendly for my lovely dog, Harry. It’s safe to say that it fits all! It’s easy to clean and doesn’t slip, which is great for a dog with frequent zoomies. Definitely ordering more! 100% would recommend
settings.title: Evelyn L.

settings.heading: Soft, Cozy, and Brightens the Room!
settings.content: This rug is great! I was worried about ordering it, as there are other rugs of this style that are much cheaper and lower quality. I took the risk, and this rug was a pleasant surprise. It’s so cute and really brightens up the space! It’s soft, thick enough for coziness, and the colors are true and vibrant. Thank you!
settings.title: Sasha.S

settings.heading: Creative, Kid-Safe, and Cat-Approved—10/10!
settings.content: I just LOVE How it’s not too gawdy but it’s still so creative and fun ! Especially love the irregular borders. The rug is super soft and plush, so safe and comfy for kids. The cat did play with the corners in the beginning but we added a bit of double sided tape on the surface and that stopped him. Overall 10/10 recommend !
settings.title: Angel T.

settings.text: I absolutely love love love this locker! I can't believe how easy it was to assemble. It has been so well thought out, designed and created. Truly nothing else like it on the market and its so quirky and fun to have as bedside tables. Obsessed!

Ready to share your style? Post photos or videos of your rug on Instagram and TikTok to earn commissions on every sale with your unique code.
